column4: I currently run Debian on a Dell laptop that has an Intel 945GM / 950GMA video card... Debian just recently switched to Xorg 7.0 and for the life of me, I can't get the latest drm xorg drivers to compile... Thus my video is S L O W... I've heard that ubuntu has 945GM drm modules already compiled / ready to go. Can anyone confirm this?
I can't confirm it, but I'm willing to bet it. Ubuntu places a huge emphasis on out-of-the-box hardware compatability.
glad to help. Have fun, and good luck.
